address.title: MateriaBrasil - Address
address.description: An address is a place associated with a supplier

supplier_id.description: the id of the supplier of the address

street_address.description: the street address of the address

zip_code.description: the zip code of the address

phone_number.description: the phone number of the address

album.title: MateriaBrasil - Album
album.description: An album is a collection of favorites

user_id.description: the unique identifier of the user the album belongs to

default.description: indicates if this album is the user's default one

answer.title: MateriaBrasil - Answer
answer.description: It is an answer to a question

about_id.description: the id of the supplier or material the answer belongs to

about_type.description: the type of object that created the response

comment.title: MateriaBrasil - Comment
comment.description: A comment is created by a user at a material, product or service

commentable_id.description: the id of the material, product of service the comment is associated with

commentable_type.description: the type of object the comment is associated with

error.title: MateriaBrasil - Error
error.description: An error represents a failed action in the API

favorite.title: MateriaBrasil - Favorite
favorite.description: A favorite is a material, product or service bookmarked by a user

album_id.description: the unique identifier of the album the favorite belongs to

favoritable_id.description: the id of the material, product of service the favorite is associated with

favoritable_type.description: the type of object the favorite is associated with

favoritable.description: the object the favorite is associated with

material.title: MateriaBrasil - Material
material.description: A material is a raw material

supplier_id.description: the unique identifier of the supplier the material belongs to

supplier_name.description: the name of the supplier the material belongs to

image_url.description: a link to the default image of the material

cover_image_url.description: a link to the optional cover image of the material

highlight_image_url.description: a link to the optional highlight image of the material

list_image_url.description: a link to the optional list image of the material

average_price.description: the average price of the material

technical_specification_url.description: a link to the pdf file with the material's specifications

average_rating.description: the average rating of the reviews of the material

highlighted.description: indicates if the material should be highlighted on the list

unit_of_sale.description: indicates the quantity/scale in which the material is sold

minimum_purchase_quantity.description: the minimum amount needed to order the material

maximum_purchase_quantity.description: the maximum amount needed to order the material

ncm_code.description: classification code of the material according to ncm

sh_code.description: classification code of the material according to sh

certifications_url.description: a link to the file with the material's certifications

availability.description: the states and/or countries where the material is available for purchase

categories.description: ids of categories to filter list

materiality_driver.description: the first driver of the material

manufacture_driver.description: the second driver of the material

management_driver.description: the third driver of the material

social_driver.description: the fourth driver of the material

published.description: whether the material is published at the material list

questionnaires_completed.description: whether the questionnaires for this material are completed or not

category.description: whether the questionnaires for this material are completed or not

material_category.title: MateriaBrasil - MaterialCategory
material_category.description: An association between a material and a category

category_id.description: the unique identifier of the category to be associated

material_id.description: the unique identifier of the material to be associated

links.title: Create
links.description: Create a new association between a material and a category
Destroy an association between a material and a category
links.title: Destroy

message.title: MateriaBrasil - Message
message.description: A message is a communication from a user to a supplier

to_id.description: the id of the supplier to which the message is sent

to_type.description: the type of object to which the message is sent

questionnaire.title: MateriaBrasil - questionnaire
questionnaire.description: A questionnaire is a list of questions of a subject

review.title: MateriaBrasil - Review
review.description: A review is created by a user at a material, product or service

reviewable_id.description: the id of the material, product of service the review is associated with

reviewable_type.description: the type of object the review is associated with

search.title: MateriaBrasil - Search
search.description: A search represents objects returned from the user's query term

categories.description: ids of categories to filter list

supplier.title: MateriaBrasil - Supplier
supplier.description: A supplier is a company that offers materials, products or services

user_id.description: the unique identifier of the user the supplier belongs to

company_name.description: the legal name of the supplier

municipal_subscription.description: the city subscription of the supplier

state_subscription.description: the state subscription of the supplier

company_revenue.description: the yearly revenue of the company

number_of_employees.description: the number of employees of the supplier

image_url.description: a link to the profile image of the supplier

materials.description: the materials that belong to the supplier

topic.title: MateriaBrasil - Topic
topic.description: A topic is created by a user to start a conversation

user.title: MateriaBrasil - User
user.description: A user is a person registered in the platform

first_name.description: the first name of the user

last_name.description: the last name of the user

image_url.description: a link to the profile image of the user

bio.description: a short biography of the user

company.description: the company where the user works

work_title.description: the work title of the user

albums.description: the albums that belong to the user

suppliers.description: the suppliers that belong to the user

public_profile.description: indicates if the user profile is public

newsletter.description: indicates if the user is subscribed to the newsletter
